REVIEW QUESTION 1  (1/1 point)
What are the three advantages of using R?

1. Publication quality visualizations  
2. Point and click program  
3. R packages  
4. Reproducibility

Ans. Publication quality visualizations, R packages, Reproducibility


REVIEW QUESTION 2  (1/1 point)
What are the two reasons for using an R-script?

1. Reproducibility  
2. Point and click program  
3. Automate your work  
4. Auto-complete

Ans. Reproducibility, Automate your work 


REVIEW QUESTION 3  (1/1 point)
Which symbol should you use to place comments in R?

1. \*  
2. /  
3. \# 
4. $

Ans. #


REVIEW QUESTION 4  (1/1 point)
Which R function should you use to remove a variable from the workspace in R?


Ans. rm()
